# Methods

$$y_{ij} = \beta_{0i} + \beta_{1i}x + \epsilon_{ij}$$

$$\epsilon_{ij} \sim N(0, \sigma^2_\epsilon)$$


$$\beta_{0i} \sim N(\mu_{\beta_0}, \sigma^2_{\beta_0}))$$


$$\beta_{01i} \sim N(\mu_{\beta_1}, \sigma^2_{\beta_1}))$$
